Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 24th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1981...
Had first career hit on 8/14/1983, off David Golden (PEN)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/16/1983, off Gabriel Valdes (PEN)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Lynchburg on 4/26/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/17/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Northeastern on 8/22/1989...
Injured on 4/1/1990 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 9-10 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1990, hitting .433 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 9/24/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1992, hitting .577 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 1 RBI against Diablo on 9/1/1992...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/8/1993 to a 3-year deal worth $5,301,000 per year...
